fields.description:
HeadingData uses Orientation sensor that was deprecated in Android 2.2.
http://developer.android.com/guide/topics/sensors/sensors_position.html
Isn't it time to implement new approach?
It would also be good if we could get rotation matrix from HeadingData as that would resolve many problems related to augmented reality apps at once.
fields.summary: Android: Ti.Geolocation's HeadingData is based on deprecated feature
